title: Bobby Addresses Why He Was Deleting Instagram Comments Last Night  + Amy Was Asked to Do Something Strange on a Flight That Made Her Uncomfortable + Phone Screener Abby Asked to Sing a BIG Event
itunes:title: Bobby Addresses Why He Was Deleting Instagram Comments Last Night  + Amy Was Asked to Do Something Strange on a Flight That Made Her Uncomfortable + Phone Screener Abby Asked to Sing a BIG Event
description:
Bobby talks about an Instagram comment he kept getting last night after posting a video. It was so crazy that he couldn’t believe it and had to start deleting comments! Amy shares a story from her flight when the guy she was sitting next to asked wanted her to fake cough…for a strange reason. Phone Screener Abby shares that she was invited to sing the National Anthem at a Huge Event and why Lunchbox has a problem with that….

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
